name: Jellio
description:
This plugin provides integration between Jellyfin and the Jellio service.
Community-maintained fork with Jellyfin 10.11.x support.

versions.changelog: Jellio v1.1.0 - Jellyseerr Integration & Configuration Management. Major features: Automatic media requests via Jellyseerr when streams are unavailable, dual configuration persistence (localStorage + server-side), request deduplication with race-condition protection, enhanced configuration UI with save button, support for both movies and TV shows, smart TMDB search integration.
Jellio v1.0.0 - Official Release. First stable release with Jellyfin 10.11.x + .NET 9 support, robust authentication, multi-library selection, web configuration UI, and direct streaming to Stremio.
